creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: dark brown; square basket weave at base; square herringbone weave along body; square base and lower walls tapering to smaller circular neck, with flared circular opening; top of neck is circled by band attached with vertical fibers, with two thinner bands wrapped underneath; interior opening is circled by one thin band; rim is formed by spiraling wrapped fibers
title: Bottle shaped basket
